section.summary:
Intro to Research

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 am Pacific Time.

In this week's webinar, we will discuss basic science research in the field of acupuncture and how to find research. We will continue our discussion of basic statistics by introducing the concept of center & spread statistics. To prepare for the lecture, please read the Kligler & Weeks 2014, Langevin et al. 2006 article and MacPherson et al. 2016 article.  In addition, bring the Kligler & Weeks 2014 article to class to use as a reference, as needed.

During the webinar, you will work on In Class Exercise #1 "PubMed worksheet". Please have an electronic copy of this word document available on your computer.

Due this week:

  • All online EIP modules completed
  • All responses due for Discussion Forum #1 before class.

Due next week:

  • Summary of clinical trial and systematic review
  • Kaptchuk & Miller 2005
